name: Wacky-O-Rama
description:
Wacky-O-Rama is a multiplayer arena shooter and, for now, it is mainly a LAN game (it has an arcade mode for single player but it is very basic). It features six distinct characters, up to seven maps and more than ten items to strategically use against your enemies.

Gather with friends in a lobby (up to four players as of now), ready up and start running after crates to collect items and quickly win the round!

Made between March and June of 2020.

Music and sound effects made with Deflemask.

Feel free to give feedback or report any problem!
